<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Black Powder Blaze](/Feats.aspx?ID=3237) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Bullet Dancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=117)

**Prerequisites**
[Black Powder Boost](/Feats.aspx?ID=3166)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a loaded firearm.

</column>

---

You learn to take advantage of every shot, flying across the battlefield with the help of your weapon's recoil. Stride and use Black Powder Boost. Make a melee Strike with the required weapon at any point during the Black Powder Boost.

**Special** If you have Bullet Dancer Burn, apply the additional fire damage to the granted Strike.
name: Black Powder Blaze
